meanings.definition: A full-sized model of a design or device, used for demonstration, design evaluation, promotion, and other purposes.
meanings.sent1: The company created mockups of the new product to show to potential investors.
meanings.sent2: Designers often use mockups to get a better idea of how the final product will look.
meanings.sent3: The mockups of the spaceship made everyone laugh because they were made out of cardboard.
meanings.sent4: Her dream house was just a mockup in her mind, waiting to be built one day.
meanings.sent5: The detailed mockups of the city skyline were so realistic, they looked like photographs.

meanings.definition: A rough draft or outline of a design or device, used for planning and visualization.
meanings.sent1: Before starting the project, the team sketched out mockups of the website layout.
meanings.sent2: The designer presented several mockups of the logo for the client to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The mockups of the new building design were so messy, they looked like a child's drawing.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas for the novel were just mockups floating around in her head, waiting to be written down.
meanings.sent5: The mockups of the garden plan were so clear, she could almost see the flowers blooming.
